title: The Good Time Girls Get Famous
description: Don't Miss the Next Wild-Willed Women of the West Adventure!The law is still after Pip and Ruby, but so are the authors of dime novels and then the moving pictures.  With the silent film industry in its infancy, and Westerns wildly popular, Ruby and Pip find themselves contracted to star in the story of their confrontation with a notorious outlaw.  But they are outlaws themselves, wanted in multiple counties across Kansas. They'll need all their wiles to take the film money to the bank and evade John Ward, the sheriff who has followed them from the Plains to the foot of the Rockies.Will Pip and Ruby make it to the Mexican border and freedom, or will John Ward catch up?
author: K.T. Blakemore
